content: Lifestyle Career Asked by AnonymousAsked on 25 Aug 2019How can I make a living or make some extra income from driving?Ever since I got my license and started driving, I realized that I like driving a lot.Are there any ways to make a living or just make some extra income out of driving, other than Grab and food delivery?3 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (3)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent
Lok Yang TengLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 25 Aug 2019You could have ads pasted on your vehicle as a source of passive income.2 comments1

Question Poster25 Aug 2019Oo, is that why I see so many cars with the McDonald’s logo?Lok Yang Teng25 Aug 2019Not sure which one you’re referring to but it’s not on the windshield but pasted on the body of the car like the public buses you see.

Gabriel Tham, Tag Team Member at Kenichi Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 25 Aug 2019Grab is the way to go if you want to drive for income. Some go even further by renting a place in JB to stay then rent out their HDB in SG.So they can pump full petrol in JB before coming into SG to drive Grab. Earn in SGD but spending in Ringgit. Triples their spending power with currency conversion.0 comments0
